mapper.select: SELECT museum_id museumId, museum_name museumName, museum_level museumLevel, show_weight showWeight, museum_address museumAddress, museum_index_url museumIndexUrl, museum_curator museumCurator, museum_antique_count museumAntiqueCount, museum_department museumDepartment, museum_ticket_price museumTicketPrice, museum_completed_time museumCompletedTime, museum_manage_img museumManageImg, museum_intro museumIntro, museum_guide museumGuide, template_id templateId, create_date createDate, creator creator, update_date updateDate, updater updater, del_flag delFlag FROM t_museum

SELECT museum_id museumId, museum_name museumName, museum_level museumLevel, show_weight showWeight, museum_address museumAddress, museum_index_url museumIndexUrl, museum_curator museumCurator, museum_antique_count museumAntiqueCount, museum_department museumDepartment, museum_ticket_price museumTicketPrice, museum_completed_time museumCompletedTime, museum_manage_img museumManageImg, museum_intro museumIntro, museum_guide museumGuide, template_id templateId, create_date createDate, creator creator, update_date updateDate, updater updater, del_flag delFlag FROM t_museum WHERE museum_id = #{museumId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_museum( museum_id, museum_name, museum_level, show_weight, museum_address, museum_index_url, museum_curator, museum_antique_count, museum_department, museum_ticket_price, museum_completed_time, museum_manage_img, museum_intro, museum_guide, template_id, create_date, creator, update_date, updater, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{museumId}, #{museumName}, #{museumLevel}, #{showWeight}, #{museumAddress}, #{museumIndexUrl}, #{museumCurator}, #{museumAntiqueCount}, #{museumDepartment}, #{museumTicketPrice}, #{museumCompletedTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{museumManageImg}, #{museumIntro}, #{museumGuide}, #{templateId}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_museum SET museum_id = #{museumId}, museum_name = #{museumName}, museum_level = #{museumLevel}, show_weight = #{showWeight}, museum_address = #{museumAddress}, museum_index_url = #{museumIndexUrl}, museum_curator = #{museumCurator}, museum_antique_count = #{museumAntiqueCount}, museum_department = #{museumDepartment}, museum_ticket_price = #{museumTicketPrice}, museum_completed_time = #{museumCompletedTime,jdbcType=DATE}, museum_manage_img = #{museumManageImg}, museum_intro = #{museumIntro}, museum_guide = #{museumGuide}, template_id = #{templateId}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updater = #{updater}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE museum_id = #{museumId}
